prompts: Create a spooky ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a pumpkin with a whimsical face.
Show me a Pokemon that has a round body shape, with a mix of orange and brown colors.
Imagine a small Pokemon that has a pumpkin body and a leafy green top with ghostly features.
Design a pumpkin-based Pokemon that can float and has a friendly yet eerie expression.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of Halloween with its pumpkin-like appearance and leafy accents.
Give me a ghostly creature with a round pumpkin body and a mustache-like appearance on top.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of nature and spookiness, perfect for Halloween-themed battles.
